name: Mercury Race
description:
Mercury Race is a multiplayer shooting & racing game set in a retrofuturistic world.
Finish each circuit in time to get the badge and become the King of the Galaxy.

Features:

  • 15 challenging circuits.
  • 8 different ships.
  • Local multiplayer.
  • Amazing 80´s soundtrack.

Game Modes:

  • Arcade: Finish each circuit in time and win the gold, silver or bronze badge.
  • Championship: If you are ready for a real challenge, run as fast as you can to become the King of the Galaxy. The countdown starts now!
  • Mercury Arena: One stadium, two ships, only one will survive. It's time for a life or death fight.
